document_data.mainbody:
uQuelve Hunzrin was a priestess of House Hunzrin in Menzoberranzan in the early 14 century DR.
DuQuelve was often ordered by Matron Arolina Hunzrin to lead trade expeditions outside Menzoberranzan.
In the , during one of these missions, the Hunzrin met two priestesses, Iccara and Bolfae, who said theyd come from the previously unknown Arach Enclave. Matron Arolina ordered DuQuelve to secretly transport the two priestesses to her. However, a mission headed by Beniago and Zaknafein DoUrden was following them. Iccara promised to DuQuelve a load of arandur and the service of a deep gnome slave, Symvyn Rivenstone. However, Zaknafein, Jarlaxle, and Kimmuriel Oblodra suddenly arrived and in the fighting Iccara was revealed to be a yochlol. In the end, Zaknafein destroyed Iccara, injured DuQuelve and freed Symvyn.
In later years, DuQuelves career stagnated despite her claim to having been in league with two yochlols, as all knew she had only been tricked by the handmaidens.
